event.title: existed here during the Spring and Autumn

data.event: Its one-character abbreviation is "晋" (pinyin: Jìn), after the state of Jin that existed here during the Spring and Autumn Period.

event.title: Autumn Period (722–403 BC), the state of Jin was located

data.event: In the Spring and Autumn Period (722–403 BC), the state of Jin was located in what is now Shanxi.

event.title: a three-way split into the states of Han, Zhao and Wei in 403 BC

data.event: It underwent a three-way split into the states of Han, Zhao and Wei in 403 BC, the traditional date taken as the start of the Warring States period (403–221 BC).

event.title: 221 BC, all of these states had fallen

data.event: By 221 BC, all of these states had fallen to the state of Qin, which established the Qin Dynasty (221–206 BC).
